live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running.  Thank you for your patience.
Work still continues in the area to get all services back online.
Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37683.summary: Some customers in Vancouver (Riley Park - Little Mountain) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37683.title: May 24 – Vancouver| All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
37691.summary: Some customers in New Westminster (Columbia) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37691.title: May 24 – New Westminster| All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
